workflow.name: Automate Instagram comment replies with OpenAI and Redis tracking
workflow.description:
This workflow automatically replies to new comments on your Instagram posts using smart AI. It checks your recent posts, finds unread comments, and skips spam or duplicates. The AI reads the post and comments to create a friendly, natural reply with emojis. It posts the reply instantly and logs everything so you can track engagement. Perfect for busy creators â€” stays active 24/7 without you lifting a finger! ## What It Monitors - **Recent Instagram Posts**: Fetches the latest posts based on your account activity. - **New Comments**: Detects unreplied comments in real time. - **Reply Eligibility**: Filters spam, duplicates, and already replied comments. - **AI-Generated Responses**: Creates personalized, engaging replies using post context. ## Features - Runs on a **schedule trigger** (High traffic: 2â€“3 min | Medium: 5 min | Low: 10+ min). - Fetches **recent posts** and their **comments** via Instagram Graph API. - **Context-aware AI replies** using post caption + comment content. - **Spam & duplicate filtering** to avoid unwanted or repeated replies. - **Tone-friendly & emoji-rich** responses for higher engagement. - **Logs every reply** with metadata (post ID, comment ID, timestamp). ## Workflow Steps | Node Name | Description | |---------|-----------| | **Schedule Trigger** | Triggers workflow based on traffic level (2â€“10 min intervals). | | **Get Recent Posts** | Fetches recent posts using Instagram Graph API. Returns post IDs needed to fetch comments. | | **Split Posts** | Splits batch of posts into individual items for parallel processing. | | **Get Comments** | For each post, retrieves comments with content, username, timestamp, like count. | | **Split Comments** | Splits comments into individual items for granular processing. | | **Add Post Context** | Combines comment + original post caption to generate relevant replies. | | **Check if Replied** | Checks if AI has already replied to this comment (prevents duplicate replies). | | **Not Replied Yet?** | Routes only unreplied comments forward. | | **Spam Filter** | Filters out spam using:
â€¢ Spam keywords
â€¢ Empty/one-word comments
â€¢ Excessive emojis
â€¢ Known spam patterns | | **Should Reply?** | Final logic gate:
â€¢ If reply key exists â†’ Skip
â€¢ If spam â†’ Skip
â€¢ Else â†’ Proceed | | **Generate AI Reply** | Uses OpenAI (or compatible LLM):
â€¢ Input: Post caption + comment
â€¢ Tone: Friendly & engaging
â€¢ Max tokens: 150
â€¢ Temperature: 0.8 (creative) | | **Post Reply** | Posts AI-generated reply via Instagram API:
â€¢ Method: POST
â€¢ Body: message parameter
â€¢ TTL: 30 days | | **Mark As Replied** | Updates internal tracking to prevent duplicate replies. | | **Log Reply** | Logs full reply details:
â€¢ Post ID
â€¢ Comment ID
â€¢ Username
â€¢ Reply text
â€¢ Timestamp
â€¢ Used for analytics & reporting | --- ## How to Use 1. Copy the JSON configuration of the workflow. 2. Import it into your **n8n** workspace. 3. Configure **Instagram Graph API credentials** (Business/Creator Account required). 4. Set up **OpenAI API key** in the **Generate AI Reply** node. 5. Activate the workflow. 6. Monitor replies in Instagram and execution logs in n8n. > The bot will **only reply once per comment**, skip spam, and use full post context for natural responses. --- ## Requirements - **n8n** account and self-hosted or cloud instance. - **Instagram Business or Creator Account** with Graph API access. - **Facebook App** with `pages_read_engagement`, `pages_manage_comments` permissions. - **OpenAI API key** (or compatible LLM endpoint). - Valid **access token** with long-lived permissions. --- ## Customizing this Workflow - Change **Schedule Trigger** interval based on post frequency (e.g., every 1 min for viral accounts). - Update **Spam Filter** keywords list for brand-specific spam patterns. - Modify **Generate AI Reply** prompt to match your brand voice (e.g., formal, humorous, Gen-Z). - Adjust **Temperature** (0.5 = consistent, 1.0 = creative) and **Max Tokens**. - Replace **OpenAI** with **Claude, Gemini, or local LLM** via HTTP request. - Add **approval step** (manual review) before posting replies. - Export logs to **Google Sheets, Airtable, or database** for analytics. **Explore More AI Workflows:** [https://www.oneclickitsolution.com/contact-us/](https://www.oneclickitsolution.com/contact-us/)

parameters.content:
## ðŸš€ WORKFLOW START

This workflow automatically monitors Instagram comments and replies with AI-generated responses.

**Features:**
- Real-time comment monitoring
- AI-powered contextual replies
- Duplicate prevention
- Spam filtering
- Engagement tracking

## â° TRIGGER

Runs every 5 minutes to check for new comments.

Adjust frequency based on your needs:
- High traffic: 2-3 min
- Medium: 5 min
- Low: 10-15 min

## ðŸ“¸ GET POSTS

Fetches your 10 most recent Instagram posts.

**API Endpoint:**
`/me/media`

Returns post IDs needed to fetch comments.

## ðŸ’¬ GET COMMENTS

Fetches all comments for each post.

**Returns:**
- Comment ID
- Text content
- Username
- Timestamp
- Like count

## ðŸ”— MERGE DATA

Combines comment data with original post context.

This gives AI the post caption/content to generate relevant replies.

## âœ… DUPLICATE CHECK

Checks Redis to see if we already replied to this comment.

**Key format:**
`replied_{comment_id}`

Prevents sending multiple replies to same comment.

## ðŸš¦ FILTER

Only processes comments that haven't been replied to yet.

**Logic:**
If reply key is empty â†’ Continue
If reply key exists â†’ Skip

## ðŸ›¡ï¸ SPAM DETECTION

Filters out:
- Spam keywords
- Very short comments (<3 chars)
- Emoji-only comments
- Promotional content

Prevents wasting API calls on spam.

## ðŸ¤– AI GENERATION

Uses GPT-4o-mini to generate contextual replies.

**Prompt includes:**
- Post caption
- Comment text
- Username

**Settings:**
- Temperature: 0.8 (creative)
- Max tokens: 150
- Tone: Friendly & engaging

## ðŸ“¤ POST REPLY

Sends the AI-generated reply to Instagram.

**API Endpoint:**
`/{comment-id}/replies`

**Method:** POST
**Body:** message parameter

## ðŸ’¾ SAVE STATE

Stores comment ID in Redis with 30-day TTL.

**Key:** `replied_{comment_id}`
**Value:** true
**TTL:** 30 days

Prevents duplicate replies.

## ðŸ“Š ANALYTICS

Logs all replies to Redis list for tracking.

**Stored data:**
- Comment & reply text
- Username
- Timestamps
- Post ID

Use for analytics & reporting.

## âš™ï¸ SETUP REQUIRED

1. **Instagram Credentials:**
   - Add Instagram Graph API credentials
   - Get access token from Meta Developer Portal

2. **OpenAI API:**
   - Add OpenAI credentials
   - API key from platform.openai.com

3. **Redis:**
   - Set up Redis connection
   - Used for duplicate prevention & logging

4. **Customize:**
   - Adjust trigger frequency
   - Modify AI prompt tone
   - Add custom spam keywords
   - Set reply filters

user.name: Oneclick AI Squad
user.bio: The AI Squad Initiative is a pioneering effort to build, automate and scale AI-powered workflows using n8n.io. Our mission is to help individuals and businesses integrate AI agents seamlessly into their daily operations  from automating tasks and enhancing productivity to creating innovative, intelligent solutions. We design modular, reusable AI workflow templates that empower creators, developers and teams to supercharge their automation with minimal effort and maximum impact.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
